name: Loch Ness (gcrsaldanha)
description:
* Actually the monster shouldn't receive horizontal inputs, but it is while on air. Use it under your responsability :P

* If the game isn't receiving inputs, click on white bar (where is Unity written) or turn full-screen on/off.

Kill the Eskimo people to survive and prove you are not a myth!

If 10 of them are alive, you're a dead monster!
